price: Hivyo nyinyi mnawaingilia wanaume kwa matamanio mkwawacha wanawake? Kumbe nyinyi ni watu wafujaji!
arabic: إِنَّكُمۡ لَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلرِّجَالَ شَهۡوَةٗ مِّن دُونِ ٱلنِّسَآءِۚ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ قَوۡمٞ مُّسۡرِفُونَ
footnotes: Na jambo hilo ni kuwa mnawaendea wanaume kwa kuwatamani, na mnawawacha wanawake! Nyinyi kwa jambo hili inakuwa mnafanya fujo, na mmetoka nje ya maumbile, na mmefanya kitendo asicho fanya hata mnyama.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: innakum latatūna al-rijāla shahwatan min dūni al-nisāi bal antum qawmun mus'rifūna
